name: Dachshund
metaDescription: Dachshunds have extremely high back problem rates. Compare the best pet insurance for Dachshunds—coverage for IVDD, spine surgery, dental issues & more.
intro: Dachshunds' adorable long bodies come with a serious downside: back problems. Up to 25% of Dachshunds develop Intervertebral Disc Disease (IVDD), which can require surgery costing $10,000. Insurance is essential for this breed.
whyInsurance: Dachshunds have one of the highest rates of back problems of any breed. IVDD surgery is expensive and common. Add in dental issues and obesity-related problems, and insurance becomes a smart investment.

costIntro: Dachshunds have moderate insurance costs despite their back problem risks. Here's what to expect:

faqs.question: Why are Dachshunds prone to back problems?
faqs.answer: Their elongated spine and short legs put tremendous stress on intervertebral discs. About 1 in 4 Dachshunds will experience IVDD in their lifetime, making back surgery coverage essential.

faqs.question: Is pet insurance worth it for a Dachshund?
faqs.answer: Highly recommended. IVDD surgery costs $4,000-$10,000, and many Dachshunds need it. Given the high likelihood of back issues, insurance typically pays for itself with this breed.

faqs.question: Does insurance cover IVDD surgery?
faqs.answer: Most comprehensive policies cover IVDD as long as it's not pre-existing. Check orthopedic waiting periods—some insurers require 12 months before covering spinal issues. Embrace only requires 6 months.

faqs.question: How can I reduce my Dachshund's back problems?
faqs.answer: Keep them at a healthy weight (crucial!), use ramps instead of stairs, prevent jumping on/off furniture, and support their back when carrying them. Even with precautions, insurance is still recommended.

faqs.question: Should I get dental coverage for my Dachshund?
faqs.answer: Dental illness coverage can be valuable for Dachshunds since their small mouths are prone to crowding and decay. Embrace and Pumpkin include dental illness coverage in their standard plans.

finalCta: Protect your Dachshund's back—and your wallet. Compare insurance quotes and find coverage before problems start.
